titleStmt.title: Act in favours of the undertakers of the cloath-manufactory at New Milns Edinburgh, the fourteenth day of August, 1685.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: "This may be reprinted, R.L.S. September the 4th, 1685, by E. Mallet."
Signed: Will. Paterson, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
